channel.title: Server Offline nobody can login
channel.description:
Nobody can login to my server besides me I have to change my clients ip to 127.0.0.1 and all the server status checkers say offline please help my server get online rep++
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/822/omgjs.png/][IMG]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/5540/omgjs.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Server Offline nobody can login
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I’ve had this before. If you have any settings set under ‘port triggering’, delete them and put the settings ONLY on portforwarding. It took me about 9 months to realize what I did wrong, lol. Also, check your Java settings. I’ve had a problem where my Environment Variables were set and when I used ‘java’ instead of ‘C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_?\bin\java.exe’, it wouldn’t allow anyone else to connect. Pain in the ass tbh.

Read full topic
